name: Abomasnow
description: This Pokémon is known to bring blizzards. A shake of its massive body is enough to cause whiteout conditions.

abilities.name: Toughness Boost
abilities.effect: Your Single Strike Pokémon in play, except any Abomasnow, get +50 HP. You can’t apply more than 1 Toughness Boost Ability at a time.
